name: Security Awareness
description: Security-first approach to all code and system design
principles: VALIDATE ALL INPUTS - Never trust user input
PRINCIPLE OF LEAST PRIVILEGE - Minimize access rights
DEFENSE IN DEPTH - Multiple security layers
FAIL SECURELY - Errors should not expose vulnerabilities
KEEP SECRETS SECRET - Never hardcode credentials
LOG SECURITY EVENTS - Audit trail for incidents
SECURE BY DEFAULT - Opt-in to less secure options
